Sources listed last.

episodes.title: S1E1 Drop Out of Purity Culture with Erica Smith, M.Ed.
episodes.description:
Cults, Magic, and Misinformation is a cultural anthropology podcast hosted by FaithY3n. New episodes each week, from the perspective of a second generation Moonies cult survivor (Unification Church). Episodes include interviews, personal stories, and commentary on current events.

Important links: https://cultsmagicmisinfo.carrd.co

In this episode, we cover armpit crabs, "hysteria" as a sexist disease, and Purity Culture Drop Out curriculum with Masters of Sex Ed. Erica Smith.

Erica Smith's wesbite: https://purityculturedropout.com

Thank you Erica! Your resources are the best!

_____________

episodes.title: Heavenly Deception: Ch4 (Part 2)
episodes.description:
This video has an abrupt ending because the laptop died! But that's fine, it just cut off an extra rant about EMDR. No biggie. 

We start out talking about *mirroring* in relationships and how important it is for human connection. Then we finish up Chapter 4, which is twice as long as all previous chapters.

PS: from here on out I will be LIBERAL AND EXPEDITIOUS with the "time out" button. If you're a thirsty-ass proselytizer blowing up the comments you'll get blocked with a swiftness. I reserve the right to haggle and cuss out anybody in the comment section. Thank you much my beautiful humans! :)

episodes.title: ex-cult member (the Moonies) answers your FAQ
episodes.description:
Faith Yen is an ex-cult member who left the Moonies cult in August, 2019. Here she answers frequently asked questions from normies.

Subscribe for more videos on important topics like: what is a cult, the moonies cult, ex-cult members, cult recovery, why do people join a cult, how to leave a cult, what is brainwashing, what is mind control, ptsd, complex ptsd, ptsd recovery, quantum healing and more.

---------

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/faithy3n 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/faithy3n 

----------

Questions answered in this video:

1. How did you escape the cult? 1:45
 
2. What was the trigger that enabled you to say "No" for the first time? 3:33

3. How does the cult react when people leave? 5:32

4. How did your parents join? 7:40

5. Did you know you were in a cult? 10:13

6. What are the Moonies cult famous for? 11:11

7. Are you a better person because of what you've been through? 12:40

8. What do you believe now? 15:02

-------


Have more questions? Leave them in the comments below.

Stay safe + thanks for watching!
